identified-content.person: GLASBERG, DR. HILARY JENNIFER (DR. HILARY JENNIFER GOLDBERG)

block.p: Dr. Hilary Jennifer Glasberg and Dr. Joel Edward Goldberg are to be married today at the Essex House in New York. Rabbi David Hoffman will perform the ceremony.

The bride, 30, is to become an assistant professor of medicine at the University of Texas at San Antonio next month. She graduated cum laude from Columbia and received her medical degree from New York University. She is the daughter of Paula Glasberg and Dr. H. Mark Glasberg of New York. The bride's father is a neurosurgeon and psychiatrist in New York and a clinical professor of neurosurgery and psychiatry at Columbia. Her mother is an executive vice president at McCann-Erickson Worldwide, the advertising agency in New York.

The bridegroom is a son of Marilyn and Nathan Goldberg of Beverly Hills, Calif. His parents are special education counselors in the Los Angeles Unified School District.
